function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher population density being a significant predictor of infection rates","Impact":"Increased risk of rapid disease transmission and higher infection rates","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures and creating policies to limit large gatherings","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps and monitoring systems for crowd control","People":"Urban residents, large gatherings, public transportation users","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, urban planners"},{"Description":"Relationships between virus viability, population density, and indoor spaces","Impact":"Higher potential for virus transmission in densely populated indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, implementing air filtration, and promoting outdoor activities","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters, outdoor air quality monitoring systems","People":"Indoor space occupants, urban residents, office workers","Owner":"Building managers, employers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Traffic volumes and travel distance as factors for COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread through transportation networks and congested areas","Mitigation":"Promoting remote work, reducing non-essential travel, and improving public transportation safety measures","Technologies":"Traffic monitoring systems, remote work technology, public transportation disinfection systems","People":"Commuters, travelers, public transportation users","Owner":"Transportation authorities, employers, public health authorities"}]}
